channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several pieces of divan bed fly tipped on corner., 19th December
item.description:
Several items of divan bed have been flytipped by the corner fence with the junction of Abergeldie Road and.Horn Park Lane, opposite Crown Court.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Horn Park Lane, Eltham

item.title: 3 piles of furniture and several bin bags along the street, 19th December
item.description:
Neighbours have been fly tipping across the street, including several pieces of abandoned furniture, and a number of bin bags. One bin bag, which contains several dangerous items such as nails and used condoms, has been split outside my house.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heyworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside number 4, 19th December
item.description:
Hello I know this bin isn't a public street bin; it belongs to the residents of 4b, but it is contaminating the street as an attraction to vermin (rats, foxes ,crows, seagulls) Please could you pass on to Waste enforcement Many thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coverdale Road, London

item.title: Playground fence needs to be repaired , it leans and there is gap children can run out of., 19th December
item.description:
